utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, uh, hey Rach. I uh, I was just coming over here to uh… Oh wait, I don’t have to lie to you, you don’t live here anymore. Uh, I’m eating their food. What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross is on a date with my sister and they shut the drapes two and a-half-hours ago.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa, I didn’t know we could date your sister!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey we know you steal our food.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m good.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, are the drapes still closed hon?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. And y’know who should’ve shut their drapes? Is that perverted old couple two doors over.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that a swing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh don’t even ask!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yuck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can’t believe Ross went out with Rachel’s sister! When Chandler made out with my sister I was mad at him for 10 years.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was like 5 years ago.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah you got 5 years left!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You wanna make it 6?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Ross, hi! Hey, how are ya? There you are!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’ll take a coffee. So how was your big date last night?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhh, it was okay. Yeah, it was fun.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah fun? Great! So uh, so did you guys hit it off?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So uh, so did anything happen? Because rumor has it you guys shut the drapes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No. Nothing happened. I shut the drapes to uh, show her slides of my favorite fossils.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, slides. So really nothing happened.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Something could’ve happened. All right? She-she really dug my slides. And-and she was definitely giving me the vibe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right. Was it the, "Please don’t show me another picture of a trilobite vibe?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Anyway, if she, if she wasn’t in to me, why-why would she ask me out again?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She asked-asked you out again?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah-uh-huh. Tomorrow night, Valentine’s Day, the most romantic day of the year. Who knows what could happen? I might not be shutting my drapes to show her my slides, if you know what I mean.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay-okay-okay-okay-okay-okay-okay! I got it! I got it! I got it! I can’t! I can’t! I can’t! I cannot go with you and my sister thing. Okay? I just can’t. It’s just too weird, all right? I imagine the two of you together and I freak out. It freaks me out. I can’t do it! I can’t do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Okay! It’s okay. It’s okay. Hey, it’s too weird for you, I won’t see her again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you. I…yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I mean after tomorrow night.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no-no! No-no-no! Please Ross, I can’t! I can’t do it! It’s just gonna freak me out!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay! Okay! Ooh-hey-hey-hey! Okay! Okay! Okay! I’ll-I’ll tell her tonight I can’t see her anymore.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You want me to call her right now?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no! No! No-no-no-no! No, I mean come on that’s-that’s crazy—I mean that’s crazy. So what’s-what’s going on with you? What is going on with you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well umm, oh! I might be teaching another class this semester!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah do it now, call right now.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is my favorite part.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah me too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh y’know what’s sadder than this? Bambi. I cried for three days with that movie. No wait two! Because on the third day my mother killed herself so I was partly crying for that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well see now that I can see crying over, but Bambi is a cartoon!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You didn’t cry when Bambi’s mother died?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes it was very sad when the guy stopped drawing the deer!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler there’s nothing wrong with crying! I mean you don’t have to be so macho all the time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not macho.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah you’re right. I don’t know what I was thinking.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I guess I just never really cried. Y’know? I’m not a crying kind of guy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man there’s gotta be something that gets you choked up! Like uh, uh oh, what if you saw a three-legged puppy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’d be sad sure, but I wouldn’t cry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, what if the puppy said, "Help me Chandler. All the other puppies pick on me."

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Cry?! I just found a talking puppy, I’m rich!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I’ve got it! I have got it! Pictures from your childhood. This will get you going good!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, what’s going on there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that’s Parent’s Day, first grade. That’s me with the janitor Martin.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where were your parents?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh they didn’t want to come!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Poor thing!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So that story doesn’t make you cry?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! Look, I don’t cry! It’s not a big deal! Okay?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! It’s not okay! It’s not okay at all!! You’re dead inside!!

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: Excuse me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: Are you Phoebe Buffay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: Can-can I get your autograph, I’m your biggest fan.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh you’re my biggest fan? I’ve always wanted to meet you! Hi! Sure! Yeah!

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: Wow! Wow, thanks a lot! I just wanna say, I think you’re really talented.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re just saying that because you’re my biggest fan. Joey listen, take good care of that guy, okay? He’s a fan. Bye!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, you saw me on Days Of Our Lives huh? Want me to, want me to do a little Dr. Drake Remoray for ya?

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: I have no idea what you’re talking about. But I, but I just got Phoebe Buffay’s autograph!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you’re Phoebe’s fan!

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I’ve seen all her movies.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Movies?

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: That was Phoebe Buffay, the porn star.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: The Fan
utterance.content: No-no, it was! She was in Sex Toy Story 2, Lawrence of Alabia, and I got her autograph! The guys at the comic book store aren’t gonna believe this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Gunther, don’t let that guy in here anymore! He just said Phoebe’s a porn star!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Well, I wouldn’t call her a star, but she’s really good. You should check out Inspecther Gadget.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: You’ll never believe what just happened, Ross just totally blew me off and he didn’t even tell me why!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh well. Y’know what honey? The best thing to do to get over a guy is to start dating someone else. Oh! There is this great guy you will love at work named Bob! He’s a real up-and-comer in Human Resources.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Y’know, thanks for trying to cheer me up, but I’m not gonna date some random guy from your work.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s not random, it’s Bob.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: It’s probably because not mature enough. Or smart enough. Maybe he doesn’t like the way I dress—No that can’t be it. It’s really gotta be the smart thing. Oh I’m so stupid! I’m just like this incredibly pretty stupid girl!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No honey, okay, okay, you wanna know why Ross canceled the date? Because I asked him to.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: You asked him too?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hm-mmm.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Why?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because you are my sister and Ross and I have this huge history…

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: I don’t understand, do you want to go out with Ross?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: You don’t want him, but you don’t want me to have him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know Bob in Human Resources…

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Ugh! I cannot believe you did this too me! You had me doubting how smart I was! You had me doubting my fashion sense!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look, this is not that big of a deal! You just don’t date Ross! There’s a million other guys out there, you just…

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Hey! You have no right to tell me what to do.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m not telling you what to do! I am telling you what not to do!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Why are you so jealous of me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Jill this is not about me being jealous of you! This is about you being a brat! Wanting what you can’t have!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Can’t have?! Excuse me, the only thing I can’t have is dairy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, all right, well you just blew your chances at dating Bob!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Who?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: In Human Resources!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …I am jealous of her?! I mean who does she think she is?! Princess Caroline?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You’re jealous of Princess Caroline?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do I have my own castle?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Uh, Phoebe’s not here is she?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh great! Did you get a movie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhhh, yeah. Yeah. But uh, I don’t think it’s the kind you’re gonna like.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You didn’t get more movies that are gonna have us reaching for the tissues all night did you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sort of…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Guys, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Phoebe’s a porn star!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: What?!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe Buffay in Buffay: The Vampire Layer.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s Phoebe! Where did you get that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well down at the adult video place down on Bleaker.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And-and I, and I saw that Joey was about to go in, so I ran in ahead of him to-to surprise him and, and then I pretended I didn’t know he was in there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! I mean, I just—I can’t, I can’t believe this. Y’know, I mean you think you know someone even, even Phoebe who’s always been somewhat of a question mark.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is so bizarre. I guess it kinda makes sense though, y’know she had such a terrible childhood.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, I had a terrible childhood and I don’t do porn.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes, but you are dead inside.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right well, I’d better take that back.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wh-what, why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: We can’t watch that! I mean that’s Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah you’re right, we can’t—we shouldn’t watch this.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Absolutely not.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know maybe a little bit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Probably just the first half.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! Hey no! This is wrong you guys! Phoebe’s our friend! Well, I’m not gonna watch it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! Good for you Joe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: The Vampire
utterance.content: Buffay, are you going to plunge your stake into my dark places?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hold on a second! What is that on her ankle?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Her ankle is what you’re watching?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well it’s hard to tell… Oh God, if she would just stop moving.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She’s just doing her job!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You sick bastards!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s a tattoo! That’s weird, Phoebe doesn’t… Wait that’s Ursula! That’s not Phoebe that is Ursula!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Re! Re! Then I can watch that! Rewind it! Rewind it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! What’s up? Oh my God! What am I doing?!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey sweetie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chicken Soup for the Soul?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There’s no back to this couch!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why are you reading this? You hate this kind of stuff.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I know, but I figured a shot y’know? Maybe one of those stories would make me cry and then you wouldn’t think I was y’know, all dead inside.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s so sweet! Look Chandler I don’t care if you can’t cry, I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that makes me feel so warm in my hollow tin chest.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Stop it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I mean, come on, seriously think about it, we get married, we’re up at the altar and I’m like this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I won’t care, because I know you will be feeling it all in here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! And if, and if we have a baby one-day, and the doctor hands it to you in the delivery room and you don’t cry, so what! And-and-and, and if we take him to college and come home and see his empty room for the first time, and you got nothing, it won’t matter to me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, well I won’t uh, worry about this anymore then.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And-and-and if I die, from a long illness. And you’re writing out my eulogy and you open a desk drawer and you find a note from me that says, "I will always be with you," and you still can’t shed one tiny tear, I know you’ll be crying a river inside.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aww, I love you so…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What is wrong with you?!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! You can’t shed a tear for your dead wife!! Now, I left you a note from the beyond!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you didn’t mean any of that?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No you robot!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You damn kids! You ring my bell one more time, I swear to… Ohh, uh Jill. Umm, that-that’s just a little game I play with the kids down the hall. Umm, they’ve really taken a liking to me. Uhh what’s-what’s-what’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Rachel and I had a really big fight, can I come in? I-I mean I know we’re not supposed to see each other anymore and I’m okay with that, it’s just that I don’t know anybody in the city and I really need somebody to talk to about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: I don’t want to talk about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, umm…

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: But you know what might really cheer me up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Seeing some more of your super-cool slides.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! Really?!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Totally, I love them! And, maybe you could finish telling me about all the different kinds of sand.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I’d love to! Here, you wait right here and I’ll go get the projector and my notes!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh great! Thanks Ross, you’re such a good friend!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Have you guys seen Jill? I can’t find her anywhere.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I haven’t.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, is Ross home? Maybe I’ll just call him to see if he’s actually seen her.

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: Who is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s Phoebe! Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh God. So-so you’re making porn movies.

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: No I’m not.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’re making one right now!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And-and you’re using my name!

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: Yeah, can I help you with something?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Look, I’m talking right now! You’re—you mean her.

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: Y’know, twin stuff is always a real big seller.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ursula
utterance.content: Yeah, I can talk them into giving you like, 30 dollars.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No!! No way! No! And stop using my name! And shame on you! And shame on all of you! You’re disgusting! Especially you with that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Slides are almost ready.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Yeah. Ooh, I know what this is missing! Alcohol!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh okay, well there’s-there’s wine in the kitchen.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Oh great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is my sister doing there?! And why are the drapes shut?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: O-okay, Rach calm-calm down, okay? She-she’s really upset we’re just talking.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! I think she is trying to make something happen with you to get back at me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So that’s the only reason she could be here huh? It couldn’t have anything to do with the fact that-that maybe I’m a good listener and I uh I put on a great slide show!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I am telling you that she is using you to get back at me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? I think I can take care of myself, I’ll talk to you later. Good-bye. Whoa! Uh, that was your sister actually. She-she thinks that you’re just using me.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, I just came from the company Ursula works for.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no, not you too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No! I just went to pick up Phoebe Buffay’s checks; there were a lot of them.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Nice!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Um-mmm, and I won’t have to go there anymore because I gave them my correct address.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s great, but isn’t it gonna bother that people still think you’re a porn star?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no! No! I know how to handle it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. You’re trying to figure out where you know me from? All right, I’ll give you a hint. From porn! Okay? Yeah your pervert boyfriend watched me in a porno movie! See?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You uh, you may have been right about Jill.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! I knew it! What happened?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, she kissed me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! You kissed!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Maybe we should give them some privacy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shhhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, I uh, I tried not to kiss her, okay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it doesn’t sound like it! I mean, it’s pretty easy not to kiss someone, you just don’t kiss them! See look at us, right now, not kissing!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let me finish, okay? She started kissing me and-and I didn’t stop it. I guess I-I just wasn’t thinking…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah that’s right you weren’t thinking! Y’know what? Let me give you something to think about!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh wait—hold it! But then I started thinking and I stopped the kissing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, well thank you for taking your tongue out of my sister’s mouth long enough to tell me that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look I-I realize if anything were to happen with me and Jill then nothing could ever happen with us!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I mean, look I don’t know if anything is going to happen with us, again. Ever. But I don’t want to know that it-it never could. So I stopped it and she got mad and broke my projector.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow. I, I don’t even know what to say. Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You’re welcome.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Are-are you crying?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just don’t see why those two can’t work things out!

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: All right, I’m leaving! Because I’m not going to spend one more day with someone whose out to sabotage my every move. That’s you Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I got that.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: And you! I throw myself at you and you say no, how gay are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You take care Jill.

utterance.speaker: Jill
utterance.content: Okay, see ya!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye-bye-e!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I-I can’t believe Jill’s gone. I can’t help it, I opened a gate.
